I have the same problem . Instead i am trying to apply transformation matrix via contrib.image.transform but it seems to use the same function 'ImageProjectiveTransform'

  • Win 7
  • TensorFlow 1.2 installed via pip.
  • Python 3.5 (Anaconda)

body:
I have the same problem . Instead i am trying to apply transformation matrix via contrib.image.transform but it seems to use the same function 'ImageProjectiveTransform'

- Win 7
- TensorFlow 1.2 installed via pip.
- Python 3.5 (Anaconda)
